label: 南北朝の動乱
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
見出し読み: なんぼくちょうのどうらん
見出し読み_mod: なんぼくちょうのどうらん
説明文: Literally, disturbance of the Northern and Southern Courts." The period between 1336 and 1392 when two rival imperial courts existed in Japan, each claiming the legitimate right to rule."
